title: What can I do if the weather information displayed on my phone is inaccurate?
answer:
l   Go to the weather screen, swipe down to update the weather.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204205946742001.png)

Before you update the weather, make sure your phone has a data connection.

If the problem persists, the application database may not be updated yet. Try again later.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204205946291002.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204205947246003.jpg)

l   Download another weather application for comparison.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204205946742001.png)

Weather information provided by weather applications may not be completely accurate. Please refer to weather information published by the Weather Bureau.

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
